title: [Client] Endless Patching Error Loop
body:
Tried to open my Client, got the error reading as follows "_**There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patch.**_"

I click "_**Restart**_" and am greeted either by a 0.1 mb update, which gives an error message, OR am greeted with the good ol' "_**We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.**_"

This loop appears endless and old posts advice is proving unhelpful.

Help would be greatly appreciated.

Upon deleting the line of text in the YAML file specified in the old posts, now I just get Update Failed "_**Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.**_"

I put the line back in and the same issue started up again. I am lost. Plox halp.

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like some of your game files ended up corrupted or missing when it was trying to repair and patch recently. Since you're getting those unspecified errors now, I'd suggest grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a **reinstall and clean uninstall** while running the HRT as admin. After that, make sure to setup your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) again, and let me know if that helps or not.

Ran it once and it failed for reasons unknown to me, I fiddled with some settings and am now rerunning it, it's made it to the reinstall segment this time, which I'm taking as a hopeful sign. Will update again if and when something happens, or, alternatively, fails to happen.
